::Hot Rod::

"It wasn't me, you overcame your feer." He kissed her.
Suddenly he became nervouse. He looked around, and back to her.
"I think we should leave, we are making quite a sceen."

::K9::

He awoke, outside his room. He went in, floped on the bed, and went to
sleep.

::DrillBit::

"Leader of the Decepticons?! When was that, I dont remember reading
about that?", he says, to Bludgeon.

OOC: I believe this RPG is in the cartoon connon, so Bludgeon never
commanded the Deceps, infact, he never existed.
